textBeforeTable: Payment details - All shipping costs are non-refundable for any circumstances. - Buyer pays all freight costs for returning the product(s). - All returned items must be the same condition as shipped in order to receive a refunds. 15% restocking fee applies to customer errors. Return policy details The buyer is responsible for return shipping costs. Money back or item exchange (buyer's choice) 30 days after the buyer receives it Refund will be given as Item must be returned within Return policy * Tax applies to subtotal + S&H for these provinces only Seller charges sales tax for items shipped to: CA*(8.75%).
textAfterTable: Seller's payment instructions If you like to pay with a credit card, please click here: http://www.itrecyclenow.com/CreditCard_Reauthorization.pdf and following its instructions. If you like to pay with check please send and make payable to: Unix Surplus 827 N Rengstroff Ave. Mountain View Ca 94043 time left Current bid amount + Shipping amount Bid Count time left current bid + shipping bids
